content.question: The words moriensque . . . equum (lines 2-3) are translated

choices.label: dying and lying upon his horse, he wept
and lying down, he wept for his dead horse
and dying, he wept for his horse, lying (dead)
the horse wept as he died and lay down

content.answer: and dying, he wept for his horse, lying (dead)

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
